Text:
please be patient while downloading for the first few hours... i have a lot of people seeding from me, and i mean A LOT!!! give it an hour or 2 and please continue to seed, dont just snatch it.... its all about sharing (or what is the point of even uploading? so one or 2 other people can have it?) no!!! share this with ANYONE who wants it... seed to at least 2:1 ratio!!!
thanks for understanding and enjoy :)
